blogPost.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 46 days in a row, down 63% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/aeHPS7EqVH
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已连续46天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了63%。🙏 https://t.co/aeHPS7EqVH。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已連續46天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了63%。🙏 https://t.co/aeHPS7EqVH。
